eu.cqse.check.framework.core.option

Class CheckOptionWrapper<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.cqse.check.framework.core.option.CheckOptionWrapper<T>

  • public class CheckOptionWrapper<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    An option of custom check. Points to an attribute of the check, that represents the option. Contains an optional default value, but no concrete set in an analysis profile. Concrete values are loaded from a CheckOptionStore in CheckProcessor.initializeChecks().
